title: NVChad - Turn Neovim Into An Awesome IDE
description:
In this video I show you NVChad, my new favorite Neovim IDE.

Install NVChad with this command
git clone https://github.com/NvChad/NvChad ~/.config/nvim --depth 1 && nvim
